title: Yale 2900lb Electric Forklift with Power Point Charger
item_description:
Yale 2900lb Electric Forklift with Power Point Charger

  • Manufacturer: Yale
  • Load Capacity: 2900 Lb
  • Fuel Type: Electric
  • Mast Type: Three Stage
  • Hour Meter Reads: 4966
  • Overall Width: 40”
  • Overall Length: 113”
  • Overall Height: 81”
  • Truck Weight: 8,010 Lbs
  • Tread Width: 6”
  • Tire Type: Cushion
  • Number of Front Tires: 2
  • Front Tire Size: 18x7-8
  • Number of Rear Tires: 2 in the middle
  • Maximum Lift Height: 189”
  • Fork Length: 42”
  • Condition: Used
  • Starts: Yes
  • Features:
    • Side Shift
    • Tilt
  • Charger:
    • Power Point Wo-Wa
    • 3 Phase
    • Dimensions: 22”W x 21”L x 27”H
